HTTPMethodsPOST.summary: The HTTP POST method sends data to the server. The type of the body of the request is indicated by the Content-Type header.

remarks.para: The difference between {{HTTPMethod("PUT")}} and POST is that PUT is idempotent: calling it once or several times successively has the same effect (that is no side effect), where successive identical POST may have additional effects, like passing an order several times.
